instruction: Name at least 3 reasons why people buy luxury items.
output: People buy luxury items for the status symbol it conveys, for the quality and craftsmanship it offers, and for the exclusivity and rarity of the item. They also buy luxury items for the prestige associated with them, for the enjoyment of owning something special, and for the experience it can offer. Other reasons may include as a sign of self-worth, to reward themselves, or to express their personality.
